Concerts I Have Seen

01 May 2007

The criteria I’ll use to dictate whether or not to list something would involve how much of an impact the show made on me. In the case of opening acts, if I remember their name and music, I’ll list them. I couldn’t possibly cover all the smaller shows I’ve seen, so I’m not even going to count shows by my peers and so forth.

Phish (stats)

Camp Oswego – Oswego, NY – 1999/07/17-18 Blue Cross Arena – Rochester, NY – 1999/12/05 Big Cypress Indian Reservation – Big Cypress, FL – 1999/12/30-2000/01/01 Pepsi Arena – Albany, NY – 2000/09/08-09 Darien Lake Amphitheater – Darien Center, NY – 2000/09/14 Hershey Stadium – Hershey, PA – 2000/09/15 Hampton Coliseum – Hampton, VA – 2003/01/02-04 Uniondale, NY – 2003/02/28 Burgettstown, PA – 2003/07/29 IT – Limestone, ME – 2003/08/02-03 Pepsi Arena – Albany, NY – 2003/12/01 Keystone Park – Brooklyn, NY – 2003/06/18 SPAC – Saratoga Springs, NY – 2003/06/20 Hampton Coliseum – Hampton, VA – 2009/03/06-08 Fenway Park – Boston, MA – 2009/05/31 Jones Beach amphitheater – Jones Beach, NY – 2009/06/2 Darien Lake – Darien Center, NY – 2009/08/13 SPAC – Saratoga Springs, NY – 2009/08/16 Empire Polo Grounds – Indio, NY – 2009/10/30-11/01

Medeski, Martin and Wood

Geneva Opera House – Geneva, NY – 2000/12/02 Lost Horizon – Syracuse, NY – 2001/10/26 RPI Fieldhouse – Troy, NY – 2001/10/27 The Egg – Albany, NY – 2005/02/25 The Egg – Albany, NY – 2006/04/05 Hammerstein Ballroom – Albany, NY – 2006/10/31 Tarrytown Music Hall – Tarrytown, NY – 2007/04/26 Rothbury Festival – Rochbury, MI – 2008/07/05 Camp MMW – Big Indian, NY – 2008/08/05-2008/08/10 92YTribeca – New York, NY – 2008/02/17 Le Poisson Rouge – New York, NY – 2008/02/18 City Winery – New York, NY – 2008/02/19 Nokia Theater – New York, NY $ndash; 2008/11/14

Trey Anastasio

moe.
